heisigStory: The villa pictured here is filled with exotic flowers at every turn, and has a pair of turtle-samurai standing before its gates.
koohiiStory1: A villa is fancier (decorated with flowers) and more robust than the average.
koohiiStory2: The teenage mutant samurai turtles live in a villa with flowers on the roof so that the neighbours don´t get suspicious.
myStory: villa. sĩ và vật đứng có cỏ. cỏ khoẻ mạnh ở villa.
